Posts.Content: DMamTech wrote: First I had an abnormal mammo; then had atypical ductal hyperplasia on stereo bx; then had lumpectomy with some artifacts that needed second opinion by Mayo Clinic; ok only radial scar no malignancy...then developed nodule in scar area 3 mo later, had US; questionable; had yet another lump removed; path results state 'organizing hematoma; extensive foreign body giant cell reaction; no evidence of malinancy. So what does that mean??? Help my doc says everything is fine.. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: multiple bx; confusing path results DMamTech leaf
